## StandardMaterial.setTexCoordTransform() method

Sets the texture transform matrix for given texture coordinate index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setTexCoordTransform(texCoordIndex: number, transform: Matrix4x4): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  texCoordIndex | number | The texture coordinate index. |
|  transform | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | Texture transform matrix, if null, the identity matrix will be set. |

**Returns:**

void
